remarks: A uniform limit of continuous functions is continuous.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Feb-2015.)
statement:
ulmcn.z $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
ulmcn.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
ulmcn.f $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> ( S -cn-> CC ) ) $.
ulmcn.u $e |- ( ph -> F ( ~~>u ` S ) G ) $.
ulmcn $p |- ( ph -> G e. ( S -cn-> CC ) ) $.
